doc:
Louis Waldon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Waldon 0 Louis Waldon (December 16, 1934 – December 6, 2013) was an American film actor, whose career spanned nearly 45 years. Born in Modesto, a town in Stanislaus County, California, Waldon began his acting career in 1965. He was best known for his collaboration with American artist and film director Andy Warhol and, as one of the Warhol superstars, appeared in several Warhol's films, including The Nude Restaurant (1967), Lonesome Cowboys (1968), Flesh (1968), and Blue Movie (1969), a seminal film in the Golden Age of Porn. He is also noted for appearing in the film Mask (1985).He was friends with fellow Andy Warhol actor Waldo Díaz-Balart.Louis Waldon died following a stroke on December 6, 2013, aged 78, in Los Angeles, California. Louis_Waldon ( December_16_,_1934 – December_6_,_2013 ) was an_American_film_actor , whose_career spanned nearly_45_years . Born in Modesto , a_town in Stanislaus_County , California , Waldon began his_acting_career in 1965 . He was_best_known for his_collaboration with American_artist_and_film_director_Andy_Warhol and , as one of the_Warhol_superstars , appeared in several_Warhol 's_films , including The_Nude_Restaurant_(_1967_) , Lonesome_Cowboys ( 1968_) , Flesh_(_1968_) , and Blue_Movie_(_1969_) , a_seminal_film in the_Golden_Age of Porn . He is_also_noted for appearing in the_film_Mask_(_1985_) . He was friends with fellow_Andy_Warhol_actor_Waldo_Díaz-Balart . Louis_Waldon died_following a_stroke on December_6_,_2013 , aged 78 , in Los_Angeles , California .
